src:
Poceni brezžične slušalke s podporo za Siri in Googlovega asistenta

06 Nov 2019, 10:12











 

Če razmišljate o nakupu brezžičnih slušalk in zanje ne bi radi zapravili preveč, imajo pri spletnem strgovcu Ebay zanimivo ponudbo, ki vas utegne prepričati. Brezžične slušalke UMIDIGI Upods so namreč na spletni povezavi https://www.ebay.com/itm/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=274073841338 na voljo za zgolj 13,99 dolarjev, kar znese prreračunanih 12,62 evra.
UMIDIGI Upods so pričakovano združljive z vsemi mobilnimi napravami iOS in Android, ki podpirajo brezžično povezavo Bluetooth 5.0. Slušalka je peresno lahka, izpopolnili pa so tudi udobje. Polnilna škatlica ima litij-ionsko baterijo kapacitete 600mAh, slušalki pa 43 mAh. Zagotavljata približno 3 ure telefonskih klicev ali 4 ure predvajanja glasbe, potem jih lahko napolnite v polnilni škatlici. Z vmesnimi polnjenji zagotavljajo do 24 ur uporabe. Polnjenje popolnoma izpraznjenih slušalk traja približno uro in pol.
Upravljamo jih lahko tudi na dotik. Z dvojnim dotikom na pomoč prikličemo glasovnega asistenta. Združljive so tako z Applovo Siri kot z Googlovim asistentom.
Več informacij o nadvse zanimivih brezžičnih slušalkah UMIDIGI Upods je na voljo na spletni povezavi https://www.ebay.com/itm/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=274073841338. Preko te povezave lahko opravimo tudi nakup.

Obvestilo


Članek smo v uredništvu pripravili na osnovi objave v spletni trgovini. Pri nakupih iz spletnih trgovin veljajo pogoji nakupa posamezne trgovine. Pri navodilih ipd. pa obstaja možnost, da le-ta niso v slovenščini ali angleščini. Uredništvo ne prevzema odgovornosti za nakup. Za kakršne koli informacije ali reklamacije se obrnite na spletnega trgovca, uredništvo pa prosim obvestite (e-naslov uredništva: rn@stromboli.si), da se v bodoče opisom izdelkov iz teh spletnih strani lahko izognemo.
text:
Cheap wireless headsets with support for Siri and Google Now

06 Nov 2019, 09:12













If you're thinking of buying a wireless headset and don't want to spend too much on it, they have an interesting offer from an Ebay retailer that can convince you. UMIDIGI Upods wireless headsets are available online at https://www.ebay.com/itm/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=274073841338 for just $ 13.99, which translates to a budget of $ 12.62.
UMIDIGI Upods are expected to be compatible with all iOS and Android mobile devices that support Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connectivity. The handset is feather-light and has improved comfort. The charging box has a 600mAh lithium-ion battery and a 43mAh headset. They provide about 3 hours of phone calls or 4 hours of music playback, then you can stuff them in the filler box. Intermediate charges provide up to 24 hours of use. It takes about an hour and a half to charge a fully emptied headset.
They can also be operated by touch. Double-tap to get help with a voice assistant. They are compatible with both Apple Siri and Google Assistant.
More information on the UMIDIGI Upods wireless headset is available online at https://www.ebay.com/itm/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=274073841338. We can also make a purchase through this link.

Notification


The article in the editorial was prepared on the basis of publication in an online store. Purchases from online stores are subject to the terms of purchase for each store. For instructions, etc. however, they may not be in Slovene or English. The Editorial Board assumes no responsibility for the purchase. Contact any online retailer for any information or complaints, and please inform the editorial office (editorial email: rn@stromboli.si) so that future product descriptions from these sites can be avoided.
